name: Snips SAS
description: Provider of an artificial intelligence based voice platform designed to solve the problem of how humans and machines communicate with each other. The company's platform uses on-device Automated Speech Recognition and offers hotword detection, speech recognition, natural language understanding and dialog management, enabling application developers and businesses to get an understanding of user's context by analyzing their location, calendar, emails, contacts and more.
